title: Silicone Red Lazy Solid Spoon
description: Rachael Ray Tools and Gadgets all have one thing in mind: making time in the kitchen fun and efficient. This Lazy Spoon fits the bill with its bright color and innovative design. Crafted from tough yet contoured silicone for extra comfort, the spoon features a side notch so it can rest on the edges of cookware, always within easy reach. The eye-catching kitchen gadget also prevents drips and spills on the countertop and stovetop and is great to use with all nonstick cookware. The Lazy Spoon is heat resistant to 500°F, dishwasher safe for convenient cleanup, and always closes at hand. Bring a dash of Rachael Ray's signature style to the kitchen with this popular, practical Lazy Spoon. Simmer and stir delicious batches of award winning Turkey Chili, and keep the food where it belongs by hooking the spoon to the side of the pot. The kitchen tool is rugged and heat resistant so there's no need to worry about this utensil becoming warped when stirring salt into a boiling pot of pasta water. Add Rachael Ray's Lazy Spoon and her other innovative kitchen tools -from Lazy Ladle to Lazy Tongs – to your collection of culinary gear to make cooking easier and a lot more fun, bringing bold colors into the kitchen.Lazy Spoon features a side notch so it can rest on the side of pots and pans when not in use, keeping drips off countertopsSpoon’s soft-grip handle brings comfort to the kitchenLazy Spoon is dishwasher safe for easy cleanupKitchen gadget is made of durable, contoured silicone that is conveniently heat resistant to 500°FSafe for use with all nonstick cookware
